name: DigitalStakeout
overview:
DigitalStakeout’s iScout products, extend a powerful reach into the Internet to identify, collect, contextualize, and analyze critical information from websites, blogs, social networks, and third party data.

iScoutNetwork enables companies to:

  • Discover Advanced Cyber Threats Targeting Networks
  • Manage Network Network Reputation
  • Monitor Supply Chain Vendor Compliance to Security Standards <br> iScoutWeb enables companies to:
  • Monitor Social Media Privacy and Reputation Risk
  • Manage Your Corporate Social Media Footprint
  • Monitor Social Media Engagement
